top.title: Around 40 dead in Swiss ski resort bar fire, police say
top.summary: A further 115 are injured, some severely, in a fire at Le Constellation bar in Crans-Montana ski resort, officials say.

top.title: Deadly clashes between protesters and security forces as Iran unrest grows
top.summary: Videos on social media showed cars set on fire during running battles as protests entered their fifth day.

top.title: Netherlands police face 'unprecedented' New Year's  violence
top.summary: Reports of fireworks and other explosives being thrown are widespread across the country.

top.title: Why everything from your phone to your PC may get pricier in 2026
top.summary: The price of Ram - once one of the cheapest computer parts - has more than doubled since October 2025.

top.title: China's BYD set to overtake Tesla as world's top EV seller
top.summary: It would mark the first time the Chinese firm has outpaced its American rival for annual sales.

top.title: How the defence sector is battling a skills crisis
top.summary: Attracting younger workers into the defence industry can be challenging.
